snippet.title: Organic Supply Shortages
snippet.description: * Organic Supply Shortages I am a fan of organic foods, but I don't buy everything organic. The reason is mainly price. We all know that the organic label comes at a premium. With food costs rising, we need to consider how we want to spend our food dollars a bit more closely.I...

snippet.description: * Eat Like a Cardiologist: A Few of My Favorite Things My patients often fret that eating a heart smart diet will be too expensive, too time consuming, too complicated, too confusing, or too dull.
